means: 溺爱，宠爱，过分地喜爱( dote的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: His doting parents bought him his first racing bike at 13.
sentence.Network_cn: 宠爱他的父母在他13岁时就给他买了第一辆竞速自行车。

sentence.Network_en: Ah, a gift from a doting grandmother, of course.
sentence.Network_cn: 啊, 原来是溺爱孙女的祖母给的礼物.

sentence.Network_en: Irene asked her doting husband if he would build her a handloom.
sentence.Network_cn: 艾琳要她的百依百顺的丈夫为她制作一架手摇织布机.

PerfectNetExp.abs: “宝贝”用英语怎么说？ -英语-外语-天涯问答 ... dote 昏聩 doting 溺爱的 Stand By Me 陪着我.

list.abs: Pro donato 作为受赠人Pro dote 因嫁资Pro emptore 作为买方
字典中媾字的解释 ... (3) 恢复亲善友好的关系,讲和,交好[ negotiate peace] (5) 厚爱,宠爱[ dote on] ◎ 媾 gòu.
近,近字的解释,查字典 ... [recent years' anecdotes] 最近若干年来的逸闻逸事 [dote on; bestow favor on] 宠幸.
GRE中文词义分类-按字母数分类_百度文库 ... dose n. 剂量，一剂 dote v. 溺爱；昏聩 doze v. 瞌睡，假寐.
“宝贝”用英语怎么说？ -英语-外语-天涯问答 ... cowshed 牛棚 ... dote 昏聩 doting 溺爱的.

entry.def: If you say that someone is, for example, a doting mother, husband, or friend, you mean that they show a lot of love for someone.

example.ex: His doting parents bought him his first racing bike at 13.
example.tran: 宠爱他的父母在他13岁时就给他买了第一辆竞速自行车。

means.word_mean: 1. extravagantly or foolishly loving and indulgent;

sentences.sentence: "deceiving her preoccupied and doting husband with a young captain"

auth_sentence.content: Raul is said to be a doting father and enthusiastic climber.
auth_sentence.res_content: Raul is said to be a doting father and enthusiastic climber.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Raul is said to be a doting father and enthusiastic climber.

auth_sentence.content: With Bob Hoskins as her husband, a doting, cuckolded thug.
auth_sentence.res_content: With Bob Hoskins as her husband, a doting, cuckolded thug.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With Bob Hoskins as her husband, a doting, cuckolded thug.

auth_sentence.content: Until you've seen her dote, you don't know what doting is.
auth_sentence.res_content: Until you've seen her dote, you don't know what doting is.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Until you've seen her dote, you don't know what doting is.

sentences.en: a present from his doting grandparents
sentences.cn: 宠爱他的祖父母送的礼物
